thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend to celebrate Anniversary
thread.title_full: Weekend to celebrate Anniversary - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Carol P
title: Weekend to celebrate Anniversary
text: Enjoyed the weekend very much. Travelled around London by bus and on foot, easy access to bus routes, and to the Thames for walking. Did the meal deal...excellent value. Good range of food on the menu. Would be difficult to suggest any more food for the breakfast buffet! Premier bed lived up to the adverts, slept soundly all night. Wi-Fi ok, and TV reasonable range of channels. Friendly, helpful staff.
